author: felixweber
title: Idea Fest by Catalyst Swarm
description: There is a lack of interaction between proposers and voters and its hard for Proposers to reach out to voters to present their projects
solution: Idea Fest provides proposers a stage to pitch their ideas and allows the voters & community to interact and discuss with them
experience: We are highly engaged fulltime Catalyst Community members and successfully organize Idea Fests since Fund 5.
